about_the_game:
Step up and place your bets! Encore Classic Casino Games delivers the best Vegas-style casino action for your PC offering a full range of your favorite casino games.

With an easy-to-navigate user interface, large cards and fast game play, Encore Classic Casino Games will make you feel like the VIP you are. It's all-or-nothing in this fast-paced collection where you can "double down" or go "all in" without breaking the bank. Don't wait for trip to Vegas to play your favorite casino games, purchase Encore Classic Casino Games today!

Game Features:

Fast Game Play!

Play quickly to keep the games exciting!

Extra Large Cards

Large cards make playing card games enjoyable.

Compete With Over 25 Characters

Compete against 25 in-game characters. There are so many "characters" to choose from from a talking bear to a Texas Cowboy, these opponents will have you laughing out loud. Each character has unique strengths, so choose wisely!

Play in Tournaments!

Tournament play Compete against other players in casino game tournaments. Will you play it safe or go all in? It's up to you!

Create Your Own Character!

Be the star you are! Choose your hair style, face shape, eye color and outfit. With FaceCreator, you can change your look as quickly as you change your mind.

Adjustable Difficulty Levels

Hone your skills with the adjustable difficulty levels. Keep up the challenge by choosing difficult levels as you keep improving Free Bonus Game!

In-Game Currency

Encore Bucks Shop-'till-you-drop with this in-game currency. The more you play, the more you earn!

Play All These Great Games!

7 Card Stud
Hi Lo
Baccarat
Blackjack
Craps
Keno
Pai Gow Poker
Progressive Slot Machines
Roulette
Slot Machine Single Line
Texas Hold'Em
Video Poker Hang 10
Video Slot Machine
And Many More

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 7
  • Processor: Pentium® IV 2.4GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM (Intel® GMA chipsets supported)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DVD-ROM drive, keyboard, mouse. Broadband internet service recommended.Administrator privileges are required to properly install the program on Windows® XP, Windows Vista®, Windows® 7, Windows® 8 and Windows® 10. ²User is responsible for all Internet access fees and phone charges. Important Installation Note: Please disable any Antivirus and/or Firewall software that you have running before installing this software. After the installation has completed and the product has been updated, you can re-enable your Antivirus and/or Firewall software.

short_description: You've hit the jackpot with the most comprehensive collection of casino games available for your PC! Encore Classic Casino Games is jam-packed with more than 600 variations on authentic casino games that will make you feel the rush and excitement of the casino floor.
